# Module: tf.python_io



Defined in [`tensorflow/python_io/__init__.py`](https://www.github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/r1.9/tensorflow/python_io/__init__.py).

Python functions for directly manipulating TFRecord-formatted files.

See the <a href="../../../api_guides/python/python_io">Data IO (Python functions)</a> guide.

## Classes

[`class TFRecordCompressionType`](../tf/python_io/TFRecordCompressionType): The type of compression for the record.

[`class TFRecordOptions`](../tf/python_io/TFRecordOptions): Options used for manipulating TFRecord files.

[`class TFRecordWriter`](../tf/python_io/TFRecordWriter): A class to write records to a TFRecords file.

## Functions

[`tf_record_iterator(...)`](../tf/python_io/tf_record_iterator): An iterator that read the records from a TFRecords file.
